version_description: - tier changing process has been fixed and improved.
- Bank relink feature has been integrated.
– Bank account screen has been updated.
– Braintree payment processor has been integrated to allow users to pay for tier subscriptions using credit cards.

– Score calculation has been optimized.
– Contact support form was updated.
– The registration flow has been updated.

Happy to introduce our new Free Same Day Transfers!
And based on your feedback, we have increased the advance amounts and added an extension feature with instant approvals.
In addition to instant advances, Vola now has expense trackers and smart graphs to make sure you never pay overdraft fees again!

Improved the registration process and we crushed a few more bugs!
It should also be easier to build your Vola Score now.
We've improved Vola's design and now it's easier than ever to use! Few issues like reconnecting and updating your bank have been fixed as well.
We’ve made it easier to control and manage your personal information. Signing up is also streamlined with fewer mandatory fields.

More updates to help you bank better-
We’ve partnered with Experian to help boost your credit score through the payments you’re already making.
The Vola score is more intuitive than ever, giving you the rewards you deserve!
